  • æ“ä½œæ­¥éª¤

    1. æ‰‹æœº#1ï¼šå°†USB OTGæ•°æ®äº¤æ¢åŠŸèƒ½æ‰“å¼€ã€‚

    8. æ‰‹æœº#1ï¼šTermuxè·å–suåï¼Œè¾“å…¥adb devicesåï¼Œå½“çœ‹åˆ°â€æ‰‹æœº#1â€çš„è®¾å¤‡å·æ—¶ï¼Œå³æˆåŠŸäº†ã€‚è¿›è€Œï¼Œè¾“å…¥éœ€è¦çš„adbå‘½ä»¤ã€‚
    9. (optional) æ‰‹æœº#2ï¼šå®‰å…¨èµ·è§ï¼Œå®Œæˆç›¸å…³æ“ä½œåï¼Œå°†USBè°ƒè¯•å…³é—­ã€‚æ’¤é”€USBè°ƒè¯•æˆæƒã€‚

 

æ‰‹æœº#1
æ‰‹æœº#2

 

  • ADB Commands

    • å¯åŠ¨shizuku
      • æ‰‹æœºæ¯æ¬¡é‡å¯åæˆ–è€…å› â€USBè°ƒè¯•â€å…³é—­è€Œå¤±æ•ˆï¼Œéƒ½éœ€è¦å†æ¬¡å¯åŠ¨shizuku (å½“â€shizukuâ€æœªå¯åŠ¨æ—¶ï¼ŒApp Opsä¸å¯è¿›å…¥è®¾ç½®ï¼Œä½†â€App Opsâ€å·²è®¾ç½®è¿‡çš„åº”ç”¨æƒé™ï¼Œæ°¸ä¹…æœ‰æ•ˆ)ã€‚ 
          adb shell sh /sdcard/Android/data/moe.shizuku.privileged.api/files/start.sh

     

    • greenify â€ƒ(ä¸€æ¬¡æ€§è®¾ç½®å³å¯)
      • Accessibility service run-on-demand: 
          adb -d shell pm grant com.oasisfeng.greenify android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS
      • Aggressive Doze on Android 7.0+ (non-root): 
          adb -d shell pm grant com.oasisfeng.greenify android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS
      • Doze on the Go: 
          adb -d shell pm grant com.oasisfeng.greenify android.permission.DUMP
      • Aggressive Doze (on device/ROM with Doze disabled): 
          adb -d shell pm grant com.oasisfeng.greenify android.permission.DUMP
      • Wake-up Tracker: 
          adb -d shell pm grant com.oasisfeng.greenify android.permission.READ_LOGS
      • Background-free enforcement on Android 8+ (non-root): 
          adb -d shell pm grant com.oasisfeng.greenify android.permission.GET_APP_OPS_STATS

     

    • full backup/restore all Android deviceâ€™s data w/o rootï¼Œè¯¦è§£
      • full backup (can encrypt your backup with a password) 
          adb backup -apk -shared -all -f <filepath>/backup.ab

        å¦ï¼Œç½‘ç»œä¸Šå»ºè®®ï¼šbacking up music, pictures, video, and other internal storage items manuallyï¼›SMSè‡ªè¡Œå•ç‹¬å¤‡ä»½ã€‚

      • full restore 
          adb restore <filepath>/backup.ab

     

    • Island æ–‡ä»¶ä¼ é€é—¨ - File Shuttle â€ƒ(ä¸€æ¬¡æ€§è®¾ç½®å³å¯) 
        pm grant com.oasisfeng.island android.permission.INTERACT_ACROSS_USERS
